ygData.subject: When is the daily server down time for Innoruuk?
ygData.msgSnippet: When is the daily server down time for Innoruuk? How long will it down normally? Btw, I finally reach lvl 12 last night with lots of help from Leshrec (for
ygData.messageBody:
When is the daily server down time for Innoruuk?

How long will it down normally?

Btw, I finally reach lvl 12 last night with lots of help from Leshrec (for
bringing my hunting and let me getting all the loot for my scrolls), Garren
(for making a great hunting team and sacrifice himself in luring monsters
and also giving up his loots), Kenven (for tanking me many times), Trifrost
(for most of the buff spells I get during hunting) and guys. Lvl 12 means a
big deal to me as it open my knowledge to one of the most important spells
for wizard - bind aff. If anyone need bind in Freeport, pls feel free to
give me a tell. Most probably I will stay around FP until I get to lvl 16
which I need to buy need spells.

Meanwhile, I've bought shock of lighting, bind & halo of light spells.
Leshrec can advise what other impt scrolls I shld buy? I'm also looking
for a runed totem stave. I've got 15pp in bank right now. If you guys
know any friend who is willing to sell at 25pp and below, pls let me know
(Leshrec got his at 20pp, very good buy). Tonight I will con't to group
our local kakis for more xp and money, hahahahahaahh! ;-? Thx alot guys!

Ziltus (call me "Zil' will do)
